an7.80:3.1: 80 Shines as an Expert in the Training Code (2)
an7.80:4.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with seven qualities shines as an expert in the training code.
an7.80:4.3: They know what is an offence. They know what is not an offence. They know what is a light offence. They know what is a serious offence. Both lists of rules have been passed down to them in detail, well analyzed, well mastered, well judged in both the rules and accompanying material. They get the four absorptions—blissful meditations in the present life that belong to the higher mind—when they want, without trouble or difficulty. They realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having achieved it with their own insight due to the end of defilements.
an7.80:4.6: A mendicant with these seven qualities shines as an expert in the training code.”
